title: (x) "Worry Doll" book cover in Tom Muller portfolio - custom, ITC Barcelona {Mike Y, Tom Muller}
content:
Hello,

I was browsing Tom Muller4s portfolio when I fell on two beauties I cant identify.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2007_worrydolltitle_6327.jpg)

the work is here

[http://www.hellomuller.com/work/2007/worry-doll.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194039/http:/www.hellomuller.com/work/2007/worry-doll.html "http://www.hellomuller.com/work/2007/worry-doll.html")

Hope You’ll find out.

thanks.

 [‹ (x) Fashion typography (similar to ITC Avant Garde Gothic) - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alt {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194039/http:/typophile.com/node/35642 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Eye magazine text face - Proforma {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194039/http:/typophile.com/node/35517 "Go to next forum topic")
author: john good

comments.content:
’Matt Coyle’ looks like ITC Barcelona.

- Mike Yanega

The main title could be a custom logo... And yet I have the feeling that I’ve seen these lettershapes before... (Some of these shapes are reminiscent of [Josef Albers’ typeface work](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194039/http:/www.p22.com/products/albers.html), but that’s not it, either.)Sorry, I know my comment isn’t very helpful. If I can remember where I’ve seen it before, I’ll post it.

I bet the main title has been custom drawn, as it is easy enough to do in Illustrator. I have done something similar constructed for a [danish music company](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194039/http:/www.allaboutseb.net/archives/132) once.

I’ll bet it’s not.  
Some other work of his uses the same face.  
Uhm, maybe it’s his own style.

ITC Barcelona is a beauty, and it’s cheap !

Thanks for your help.

+

I’ve taken a look at all his work on his site & haven’t come across the same face anywhere. What I did come across were the logo’s for Event Horizon & Where To Start which are somewhat similar in style & -according to me- obviously custom. If anything, I’m even more convinced now that it’s custom, but you could always contact him to find out...

I could’ve overlooked it though, but I just didn’t see it anywhere...  
Anyway, I really have to thank you for the link, there’s some great stuff on Muller’s site!

This old FontBank font called [’Outland’](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194039/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/outland.htm) is similar. My notes say it’s ’real’ name is ’Disco’, but I suspect it was not digitized.

- Mike Yanega

Hi everyone,

Some clarification: the “Worry Doll” type is indeed a custom design. “Matt Coyle” is indeed set in ITC Barcelona.

I’ve written a blog post about the design of the cover/book here:  
 [http://www.hellomuller.com/blog/2007/07/22/anatomy-of-a-cover-worry-doll...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194039/http:/www.hellomuller.com/blog/2007/07/22/anatomy-of-a-cover-worry-doll/ "http://www.hellomuller.com/blog/2007/07/22/anatomy-of-a-cover-worry-doll/")

TomM./helloMuller.

the real Tom !?! wow !

love your work.

+
